radiographic_examinations.findings: Pituitary tumor eroding the floor of the sella and extending into the sphenoidal sinus.
Multiple liver metastases confirmed by biopsy as pituitary origin.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of liver metastases and spread to the skeleton after 6 months on temozolomide.
â‰¥ 50% regression of the liver metastases after five cycles of temozolomide.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Invasive, clinically silent macroadenoma with a solid and cystic component.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Prolactin normalized but no shrinkage of tumor.
